name: tod's grat adventur
description:
tod is a mushroom man who lost his cheez its.

go help him find his cheez its or else it will rot.

he is named tod because legal reasons.

controls:

A, D/Left, Right - move

S/Down - crouch

Space/Z - jump

OST:

Palmtree Panic - Sonic CD
Title Theme - Sonic CD
Competition Results - Sonic 3
